subject: Re: Frank's Box on "livescifi" tonight??
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Missed that! I did the first long bike ride of the season, with a 
headwind most of the way, only twenty miles, but it was grueling. I 
was wiped out till about 8pm. 

 I now have a low voltage warning light for systems with gel cells, 
or other rechargable batteries. Probably should just incorporate it 
in the circuits, the sweep will run at low voltages, but you get less 
and less of the top of the bands as the battery voltage drops. 

 Frank-S

 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "misujoey" <Debbie@...> wrote:
